attributes.action: STOP BIG HOUSE BUILDING FIRMS DROPPING TRADESMANS PRICES
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a self employed bricklayer, I have been working on sites building new homes for 10 years. Over the last 6-7 yrs, the prices we tradesmen are paid have not increased, though the cost of living and other peoples wages have. Even as house prices doubled there was no increase, but now, as there is a slight fall in house prices, prices are dropping for tradesmen everywhere, as firms are making millions in profit.

rejection.details: Please restrict your use of capital letters.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
